ualberta.g12.adventurecreator.tasks

Class DownloadStoryTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.os.AsyncTask<Story,java.lang.Void,java.lang.String>
      • ualberta.g12.adventurecreator.tasks.DownloadStoryTask

  • public class DownloadStoryTask
extends android.os.AsyncTask<Story,java.lang.Void,java.lang.String>
    This task is used to download a story from the list of online stories to a users offline list. If the story doesn't properly download then we will notify the user of this.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DownloadStoryTask

        public DownloadStoryTask(android.content.Context c)
        Creates a new DownloadStoryTask with the given Context. The context is used to create toast messages to update the user of the status of the download.
